Notes from Brio!:

Hiya- this is a little demo of a game testing out ideas and using hacks.  

Here's the list of hacks I used,

>dialog audio vocal synth (by Sean S. LeBlanc)

>directional avatar (by Sean S. LeBlanc)

>transparent sprites (by Sean S. LeBlanc)

>gravity (by Cole Sea)

>add bitsy audio (by Mark Wonnacott)
